hadith.text: Abu Salama b. 'Abd al-Rahman is reported to have said that he had heard Abu Huraira saying:I would say prayer along with you which is near to the prayer of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º). and Abu Huraira recited Qunut in the noon and in the 'Isya' and in the morning prayer, and invoked blessing (of Allah) upon Muslims-and curse upon the unbelievers
